commentBody:
It's amazing that a team can go 10-6 and still miss the playoffs but they can be proud that they played an exciting season.

I really happy that the Jets finally have a quarterback.

replies.commentBody:
You don't, actually.

Trust me, I have seen about 20 years of bad quarterbacks on this end of the state, and I'm afraid to tell you that Fitz is one of them. Really nice guy, does a lot with his skill set, but just not good enough in the end.

In both the Bills games against the Jets this year, watching Fitz trying to lead the comebacks, I thought "it's nice to be on this end of it", because I knew I had seen this movie before. And it doesn't end well for the poor guy.
